StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramBooksByDocumentGroupId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Title varchar(50) = null, @Descrip.on varchar(50) = null, @Keywords varchar(50) = null, @ProgramDocumentGroupId integer = 0
) AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SQLString NVARCHAR(1500) DECLARE @WhereClause NVARCHAR(1000)
SET @SQLString = 'SELECT P.ID, P.Title, P.Descrip.on, P.Keywords, P.FileName,P.ProgramDocumentGroupID FROM USMC.ProgramDocument P '
if @ProgramDocumentGroupId IS NOT NULL AND @ProgramDocumentGroupId != 0 SET @WhereClause = ' WHERE ProgramDocumentGroupID = ' + CONVERT(varchar, @ProgramDocumentGroupId)
if @Title IS NOT NULL AND @Title != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND Title = ''' + @Title + ''''
if @Descrip.on IS NOT NULL AND @Descrip.on != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND Descrip.on = ''' + @Descrip.on + ''''
if @Keywords IS NOT NULL AND @Keywords != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND Keywords = ''' + @Keywords + ''''
SET @SQLString = @SQLString + @WhereClause
EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString
print @SQLString
END
